title: Allocation of Land at New Town, Ratnapura for the construction of the Sabaragamuwa Provincial office of the Department of Community Based Corrections
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Patali Champika Ranawaka, the Minister of Megapolis and Western Development, to vest a portion of land of 20 perches in extent from the Farm Garden Estate at the New Town in Ratnapura, owned by the Urban Development Authority with the the Department of Community Based Corrections for construction of the Sabaragamuwa Provincial office of the Department, through the Divisional Secretary of Ratnapura, was approved by the Cabinet.
